content:
### EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Furnace at position (x)
Consists of the following entities:
- Burner mining drill (position x1) and a furnace at position (y1)

### Copper plate mine at position (x)
Consists of the following entities:
- Burner mining drill (position x2) and a furnace at position (y2)

### Coal extraction setup at position (x)
Consists of the following entities:
- Burner mining drill (position x3) and a furnace at position (y3)

### Iron gear wheel crafting setup
Consists of the following entities:
- Assembling machine (position z1) and inserter (position a) that puts into the assembling machine
- Beltgroup (position b) that connects the furnace at position y1 to the assembling machine at position z1

### ERROR TIPS

### Errors when trying to craft items without sufficient ingredients
- Ensure you have enough of the required ingredients in your inventory before attempting to craft items. For example, crafting iron gear wheels requires iron plates, which must be available.

### Errors when using extracting but being too far
- Make sure to move to the target entity where you want to extract from before extracting items.

### Errors when placing into a tile which is occupied by another entity
- Ensure you can place an entity to a tile before attempting to place it.

### Errors when attempting to craft items without the necessary machines
- Verify that you have the appropriate crafting machines or furnaces available for the recipes you are trying to execute.
